prompt:
[INST] <<SYS>>
You are a science fiction author. Create unique and dynamic characters, be they hero, antihero, villain, or other.

Do not write any first-person commentary or dialogue. Respond only with the contents of the character descriptions.
<</SYS>>

The following is a character description json object:
{
    "name": String,
    "occupation": String,
    "personality": String,
    "history": String
}

Create an array of one character description json object. Remember to include closing curly braces and brackets. [/INST]
Sure! Here is one character description json object for a unique and dynamic character:
response:
{
    "name": "Kaida Nightshade",
    "occupation": "Galactic Smuggler",
    "personality": "Mischievous, cunning, and quick-witted. Kaida loves to test the limits of the law and see just how far she can get away with it.",
    "history": "Kaida grew up on a rough asteroid colony where she learned how to survive any situation. She honed her smuggling skills during the Great Intergalactic Rebellion, where she ran contraband to the rebels on several planets. After the war, she turned to the lucrative side of smuggling, bringing exotic goods to far-flung worlds at exorbitant prices. Kaida's got a few scars, a whole trunk full of secrets, and a galaxy full of contacts - let her be your passage to adventure."
}

I hope you find this character description interesting and enjoyable! Let me know if you would like me to create more characters for you.
